root.name: 18 Wheels Of Steel: Haulin'
root.description: Plot No longer do you take orders from your boss - you are the boss. Take control behind the wheel or hire other truckers to haul the loads. With 24 companies competing for jobs across the highways of the USA and Canada, can yours be the best? Features Truck interiorOver 35 drivable rigs and trailersOver 45 different cargo typesRealistic vehicle interiorsSimulated handlingUpgradable truck partsSimulated CB RadioMore than 30 major U.S cities implementedRealistic damage modeling System Requirements Operating System: Windows XP / Me / 98 Processor: Pentium 3 Memory: 256 MB RAM Hard drive: 400 MB Video Card: 16MB Directx 8.1 Other: 16-bits Sound Card
